Constructor Detail

Jeroo

public Jeroo()
Creates a Jeroo facing EAST with 0 flowers.

Jeroo

public Jeroo(Jeroo.Direction dir)
Creates a Jeroo with 0 flowers.

Parameters:
dir - the direction the Jeroo is facing.

Jeroo

public Jeroo(int flowers)
Creates a Jeroo facing EAST.

Parameters:
flowers - the number of flowers the Jeroo starts with.

Jeroo

public Jeroo(Jeroo.Direction dir,
             int flowers)
Creates a Jeroo.

Parameters:
dir - the direction the Jeroo is facing.
flowers - the number of flowers the Jeroo starts with.
Method Detail

getFlowers

public int getFlowers()
Gets the number of flowers.

Returns:
the number of flowers in the Jeroo's pouch.

hop

public void hop()
Moves forward one space.

Throws:
JerooException - if the jeroo runs into something.

hop

public void hop(int spaces)
Moves forward several spaces.

Parameters:
spaces - the number of spaces to hop
Throws:
JerooException - if the jeroo runs into something.

turn

public void turn(Jeroo.RelDirection dir)
Turns in the indicated direction, but stays in the same space. If dir is not LEFT or RIGHT, this method does nothing.

Parameters:
dir - the direction to turn.

plant

public void plant()
Plants a flower at the current location. This method does not do anything if this jeroo is out of flowers.

toss

public void toss()
Tosses a flower one space ahead. If there is a net ahead of this Jeroo, it is disabled. This method does not do anything if this jeroo is out of flowers.

pick

public void pick()
Picks a flower from the current location. This method does not do anything unless this Jeroo is standing on a flower.

give

public void give(Jeroo.RelDirection relDir)
Gives a flower to a Jeroo in an adjacent space.

hasFlower

public boolean hasFlower()
Determines if this Jeroo has a flower.

Returns:
true if the Jeroo has one or more flowers

isFlower

public boolean isFlower(Jeroo.RelDirection relDir)
Checks if the object in a certain direction is a Flower.

Parameters:
relDir - the direction to check

public boolean isFacing(Jeroo.Direction dir)
Determines if the Jeroo is facing a certain direction.

Parameters:
dir - the direction to compare to.
Returns:
true if the Jeroo is facing dir

act

public void act()
Do not use this method. This is the act method from Actor. JerooWorld does not call this method when the step button is clicked.

Specified by:
act in class StackableActor
